title: 初玩 遊戲閃退
author: kikishuw
txt_content:
想請教版上的各位大大們

小的在昨天購買正版后進行遊玩

版本為1.10.2 成功進入選取個人模式或多人模式畫面

點選個人模式后 進入遊戲就立馬閃退

並且出現以下這些字幕 小的英文弱

有請各位大大們幫小的看看究竟是什麼問題QQ


Completely ignored arguments: [--nativeLauncherVersion, 307]
[01:52:54] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: JazzSpeakers
[01:52:55] [Client thread/WARN]: Skipping bad option: lastServer:
[01:52:55] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[01:52:56] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default

[01:53:15] [Thread-5/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[01:53:15] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started

[01:53:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting integrated minecraft server version 1.10.2

[01:53:23] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 10%

[01:53:26] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 56%
[01:53:27] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 70%
[01:53:28] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 85%
[01:53:29] [Server thread/INFO]: Changing view distance to 8, from 10
[01:53:30] [Server thread/INFO]: JazzSpeakers[local:E:b1005955] logged in with entity id 1719 at (134.5, 68.0, 141.5)
[01:53:30] [Server thread/INFO]: JazzSpeakers ?????
[01:53:39] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 5902ms behind, skipping 118 tick(s)

replies.txt_content:
你好：
你的ID应该是：jazzspeakers
这个提示是说
你应该 系统时间是否改变了
或者
你连接超时 5902ms 
又或者
服务器超载！

replies.author: kikishuw
replies.txt_content:
1029131145 发表于 2016-11-4 10:46
你好：
你的ID应该是：jazzspeakers
这个提示是说
你好
這樣有什麼辦法解決嗎QQ
我現在處於玩不了的狀態QQ

replies.author: aptxliuyipeng
replies.txt_content: 在crash-reports里把最新的报告发来
重新下一个客户端试试！

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
请将客户端的crash-report发上来
这服务端看不出来问题
至于什么延迟根本是 扯淡
水水水水水水水水水水
